llmprovider oaicompat.text:
üèÜ  Online Global Hackathon Winners

We had a great time running our first online hackathon. You all worked hard, and it reflected during the many hours and days we spent reviewing your submissions. I'm now happy to announce the winners:

1Ô∏è‚É£ CoAct_1 ‚Äî <@620592561974935553> 
Implemented a new agent architecture inspired by recent research, rebuilding the core loop in Python. Integrates Cua for computer use with Ollama optional for GUI grounding. Includes a polished frontend and modular design.

2Ô∏è‚É£ Trajectory Redaction with Perceptron ‚Äî <@229137745237245953> 
A clean, practical extension of Cua enabling local trajectory and screenshot redaction. Uses callbacks and a local Perceptron Isaac model for visual redaction, with Ollama as an optional LLM for text redaction.

3Ô∏è‚É£ Sarvaj√±aGPT ‚Äî <@1085162835593674813> 
A local-first AI assistant integrating Cua automation with Ollama (Qwen) for multimodal, privacy-preserving workflows. Automates Word, VS Code, and file operations through tool-use and local Windows process control.

üéâ Congratulations to everyone who participated in our first online hackathon!
